mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_visa ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, handling_date, user_id, state, receive_type_id, receive_date, service_id, service_order_id, receivable, received, amount, discount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{handlingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId}, #{state}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceId}, #{serviceOrderId}, #{receivable}, #{received}, #{amount}, #{discount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(bonus), 0.00) from b_visa where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and is_close = 0;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, state, receive_type_id AS receiveType, receive_date AS receiveDate, service_id AS serviceId, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, receivable, received, amount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_visa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_visa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
